item.description:
Hi all -

Many thanks to Russ, Steve, Ryan, and Sarah who are helping with this group.

You're invited to drop in at Legal Sea Foods in Copley for a drink on Monday, December 20th. No formal talks, introduction, just a time to say hello and meet some other friendly folks.

No charge!

If people want to stay for dinner, we can .... let me know your thoughts!!

If we don't connect, please have a safe holiday season!

Best ~ Diane

p.s. On the off chance you know people in Taiwan, I will be traveling there in late January and welcome any introductions.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a red jacket and be in the front bar area .....
item.name: Drinks and drop in - Monday, Dec 20th @ Legals in Copley // No charge!
